summary: In the 1970s a music promoter plucks Siamese twins from obscurity and grooms them into a freakish rock'n'roll act. A dark tale of sex, strangeness and rock music.
cast: Jonathan Pryce|John Simm|Ken Russell|James Greene|Elizabeth Rider|Luke Wagner|Anna Nygh|Howard Attfield|Sean Harris|Edward Hogg|Bryan Dick|Nicholas Millard|David Kennedy|Ken Bones|Jane Horrocks|Roger Watkins|Luke Treadaway|Harry Treadaway|Steven Eagles|Raymond Pickard|Joe Van Moyland|Tom Bower|Ray Cooper|Kenneth Hadley|Isabel Skinner|Michelle Bayton|Gillian Garr|Ruthe|Neil Skye Mackay|Matthew Pearson|Kieran Rushby|Kristel George|Brian Dawn|Anne Lambton|Tania Emery|Diana Kent|Jack Dunkley|Jeffry Wickham|Tom Sturridge|Barbara Ewing|Ross Gowland|Jimi James
title: Brothers of the Head
